"Create a customizable laundry basket that can be personalized with different colors, designs, and patterns to fit your individual style and preferences."
"Develop a smart laundry basket that can keep track of your laundry needs and alert you when it's time to do your laundry."
"Design a modular laundry basket that can be easily expanded or reconfigured to accommodate different sizes and types of laundry."
"Create a portable and foldable laundry basket that can be easily transported and stored in small spaces."
"Develop a self-cleaning laundry basket that uses UV light or other technologies to eliminate odors and bacteria."
